nodes.text: Kooib-s Guvar was a female holojournalist on Coruscant. While on Coruscant, Sabé made contact with Guvar to try and find out information about the senators of the Galactic Republic for Padmé Amidala, but was forced to give up when Guvar revealed she was trying to work out why Sabé was interested in the Senate.
The actress Amy Acker served as Queen's Shadow author E. K. Johnston's inspiration for Koob-s Guvar's physical appearance.
